description: High-performance vector search and persistent memory using libSQL.

connections.stdioFunction: config => ({ command: 'npx', args: ['-y', 'mcp-memory-libsql'], env: { LIBSQL_URL: config.libsqlUrl, LIBSQL_AUTH_TOKEN: config.libsqlAuthToken || '' } })

libsqlUrl.description: URL for the libSQL database, e.g., 'file:/path/to/database.db' for local or 'libsql://your-database.turso.io' for remote.

libsqlAuthToken.description: Authentication token for remote libSQL databases.
